EmailTemplate.name: EMS-Webinars_Paper-to-ePCR_Nov10.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation for Webinar: Transitioning from Paper to Electronic Patient Care Reporting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Registration Confirmation Webinar: Transitioning from Paper to Electronic Patient Care Reporting
This is your confirmation that you are registered for the complimentary webinar on Transitioning from Paper to Electronic Patient Care Reporting.
This presentation will touch on the following aspects of transitioning from paper to electronic patient care reporting: -Benefits -Project Scope -Equipment -Hardware -Software -Training -Budget -Results
You will receive a reminder one day before the live event, as well as a reminder within the hour before the begining of the webinar.
We look forward to having you attend!
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/vkyzkhv DATE: November 10, 2011 TIME: 2 PM Eastern| 1 PM Central Noon Mountain | 11 AM Pacific PRESENTER: PRESENTER: Larry Cole, EMT-P, Former Director of Finance and Corporate Compliance AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial the toll free number on your screen when you login
Trouble Logging In? Call 800.799.4510 for the iLinc Support Team Help
Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communications Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 | PH: 858.799.7000
